statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE experimental_condition = 'control';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM experimental_data;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM experimental_data WHERE experimental_condition = 'treatment';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE experimental_condition = 'Condition A' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value, experimental_condition FROM experimental_data GROUP BY experimental_condition HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT experiment_id, experimental_condition, data_type, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE data_type <> 'Pressure' ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM experimental_data;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data;
SELECT id, data_name FROM experimental_data WHERE data_type='Sensor Data';
SELECT data_name, experiment_date, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT model_name, author_name, publication_date FROM computational_models;
SELECT id, model_name, author_name FROM computational_models WHERE model_type='Deep Learning';
SELECT id, data_name, data_type FROM experimental_data WHERE data_type = 'DNA' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT model_name, model_type, publication_date FROM computational_models WHERE model_type = 'Neural Network' ORDER BY model_name ASC
SELECT id, data_name, data_type, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE experiment_date > '2020-01-01' AND data_value >= 10 ORDER BY experiment_date ASC, data_value DESC
SELECT model_name, author_name, publication_date FROM computational_models WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY author_name ASC, publication_date DESC
SELECT id, data_name, experiment_date, data_value FROM experimental_data WHERE data_value BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY data_name ASC, experiment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalData ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT id, experiment_name, data_value FROM ExperimentalData WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM ComputationalModel WHERE model_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT model_name, created_date FROM ComputationalModel ORDER BY created_date;
SELECT research_title, researcher_name, research_date FROM SystemBiologyResearch WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalData WHERE experiment_name = 'Experiment A';
SELECT id, experiment_name, data_value FROM ExperimentalData WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title FROM SystemBiologyResearch WHERE research_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT model_name, model_description, created_date FROM ComputationalModel WHERE model_name LIKE '%model%';
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalData JOIN ComputationalModel ON ExperimentalData.id = ComputationalModel.id WHERE model_name = 'Model X';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data;
SELECT experiment_name, data_timestamp FROM experimental_data WHERE experimental_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT model_name FROM computational_models WHERE model_description LIKE '%simulation%';
SELECT experiment_name, data_values->>'results' AS experiment_results FROM experimental_data WHERE data_values->>'status' = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE experimental_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, data_timestamp FROM experimental_data WHERE data_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM computational_models WHERE model_description LIKE '%simulation%';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM data_model_relationship WHERE relationship_type = 'correlation' ORDER BY experimental_id DESC;
SELECT id, experiment_name, data_value FROM experimental_data;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_date FROM computational_model ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'measurement_unit';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT output_name, output_value FROM model_output WHERE model_id = 2 ORDER BY output_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT data_type, AVG(data_value) as avg_value FROM experimental_data GROUP BY data_type HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50
SELECT * FROM computational_model WHERE model_type = 'ML' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT model_name, COUNT(model_id) as total_parameters FROM model_parameters GROUP BY model_name

SELECT model_name, output_name, output_value FROM model_output INNER JOIN computational_model ON model_output.model_id = computational_model.id WHERE computational_model.model_type = 'Simulation' ORDER BY output_value DESC
